data.name: AcceptLineDescription
data.value: Accept the input or move to the next line if input is missing a closing token.

data.name: AddLineDescription
data.value: Move the cursor to the next line without attempting to execute the input

data.name: BackwardCharDescription
data.value: Move the cursor back one character

data.name: BackwardDeleteCharDescription
data.value: Delete the charcter before the cursor

data.name: BackwardDeleteLineDescription
data.value: Delete text from the cursor to the start of the line

data.name: BackwardKillLineDescription
data.value: Move the text from the cursor to the beginning of the line to the kill ring

data.name: BeginningOfHistoryDescription
data.value: Move to the first item in the history

data.name: BeginningOfLineDescription
data.value: Move the cursor to the beginning of the line

data.name: CancelLineDescription
data.value: Abort editing the current line and re-evaluate the prompt

data.name: ClearKillRingDescription
data.value: Remove all items from the kill ring

data.name: ClearHistoryDescription
data.value: Remove all items from the command line history (not PowerShell history)

data.name: CompleteDescription
data.value: Complete the input if there is a single completion, otherwise complete the input with common prefix for all completions. Show possible completions if pressed a second time.

data.name: DeleteCharDescription
data.value: Delete the character under the cusor

data.name: ShellBackwardWordDescription
data.value: Move the cursor to the beginning of the current or previous token or start of the line

data.name: EmacsCtrlXDescription
data.value: String is not used in the UI

data.name: EmacsMetaDescription
data.value: String is not used in the UI

data.name: EndOfHistoryDescription
data.value: Move to the last item (the current input) in the history

data.name: EndOfLineDescription
data.value: Move the cursor to the end of the line

data.name: ExchangePointAndMarkDescription
data.value: Mark the location of the cursor and move the cursor to the position of the previous mark

data.name: ForwardCharDescription
data.value: Move the cursor forward one character

data.name: ForwardDeleteLineDescription
data.value: Delete text from the cursor to the end of the line

data.name: ShellForwardWordDescription
data.value: Move the cursor to the beginning of the next token or end of line

data.name: HistorySearchBackwardDescription
data.value: Search for the previous item in the history that starts with the current input - like PreviousHistory if the input is empty

data.name: HistorySearchForwardDescription
data.value: Search for the next item in the history that starts with the current input - like NextHistory if the input is empty

data.name: IgnoreDescription
data.value: String is not used in the UI

data.name: ShellBackwardKillWordDescription
data.value: Move the text from the cursor to the start of the current or previous token to the kill ring

data.name: KillLineDescription
data.value: Move the text from the cursor to the end of the input to the kill ring

data.name: ShellKillWordDescription
data.value: Move the text from the cursor to the end of the current or next token to the kill ring

data.name: NextHistoryDescription
data.value: Replace the input with the next item in the history

data.name: PasteDescription
data.value: Paste text from the system clipboard

data.name: PossibleCompletionsDescription
data.value: Display the possible completions without changing the input

data.name: PreviousHistoryDescription
data.value: Replace the input with the previous item in the history

data.name: RedoDescription
data.value: Redo an undo

data.name: RevertLineDescription
data.value: Equivalent to undo all edits (clears the line except lines imported from history)

data.name: SetMarkDescription
data.value: Mark the location of the cursor

data.name: TabCompleteNextDescription
data.value: Complete the input using the next completion

data.name: TabCompletePreviousDescription
data.value: Complete the input using the previous completion

data.name: UndoDescription
data.value: Undo a previous edit

data.name: YankDescription
data.value: Copy the text from the current kill ring position to the input

data.name: YankPopDescription
data.value: Replace the previously yanked text with the text from the next kill ring position

data.name: StartOutOfRange
data.value: 'start' cannot be less than zero or greater than the length of the buffer

data.name: ReplacementLengthTooBig
data.value: length is too big

data.name: DisplayAllPossibilities
data.value: Display all {0} possibilities? (y or n) _

data.name: ClearScreenDescription
data.value: Clear the screen and redraw the current line at the top of the screen

data.name: GotoBraceDescription
data.value: Go to matching brace

data.name: AbortDescription
data.value: Abort the current operation, e.g. incremental history search

data.name: ForwardSearchHistoryDescription
data.value: Search history forward interactively

data.name: ReverseSearchHistoryDescription
data.value: Search history backwards interactively

data.name: BackwardKillWordDescription
data.value: Move the text from the start of the current or previous word to the cursor to the kill ring

data.name: BackwardWordDescription
data.value: Move the cursor to the beginning of the current or previous word

data.name: ForwardWordDescription
data.value: Move the cursor forward to the end of the current word, or if between words, to the end of the next word.

data.name: KillWordDescription
data.value: Move the text from the cursor to the end of the current or next word to the kill ring

data.name: NextWordDescription
data.value: Move the cursor forward to the start of the next word

data.name: UnixWordRuboutDescription
data.value: Move the text from the cursor to the start of the current or previous whitespace delimited word to the kill ring

data.name: CharacterSearchBackwardDescription
data.value: Read a character and move the cursor to the previous occurence of that character

data.name: CharacterSearchDescription
data.value: Read a character and move the cursor to the next occurence of that character

data.name: DigitArgumentDescription
data.value: Start or accumulate a numeric argument to other functions

data.name: YankLastArgDescription
data.value: Copy the text of the last argument to the input

data.name: YankNthArgDescription
data.value: Copy the text of the first argument to the input

data.name: AcceptAndGetNextDescription
data.value: Accept the current line and recall the next line from history after the current line finishes executing

data.name: KeyIsUnbound
data.value: Key is unbound

data.name: SelfInsertDescription
data.value: Insert the key typed

data.name: ShowKeyBindingsDescription
data.value: Show all key bindings

data.name: WhatIsKeyDescription
data.value: Show the key binding for the next chord entered

data.name: CopyDescription
data.value: Copy selected region to the system clipboard. If no region is selected, copy the whole line

data.name: CutDescription
data.value: Delete selected region placing deleted text in the system clipboard

data.name: KillRegionDescription
data.value: Kill the text between the cursor and the mark

data.name: SelectBackwardCharDescription
data.value: Adjust the current selection to include the previous character

data.name: SelectBackwardWordDescription
data.value: Adjust the current selection to include the previous word

data.name: SelectForwardCharDescription
data.value: Adjust the current selection to include the next character

data.name: SelectForwardWordDescription
data.value: Adjust the current selection to include the next word using ForwardWord

data.name: SelectNextWordDescription
data.value: Adjust the current selection to include the next word

data.name: SelectShellBackwardWordDescription
data.value: Adjust the current selection to include the previous word using ShellBackwardWord

data.name: SelectShellForwardWordDescription
data.value: Adjust the current selection to include the next word using ShellForwardWord

data.name: CaptureScreenDescription
data.value: Allows you to select multiple lines from the console using Shift+UpArrow/DownArrow and copy the selected lines to clipboard by pressing Enter.

data.name: InvokePromptDescription
data.value: Erases the current prompt and calls the prompt function to redisplay the prompt

data.name: ScrollDisplayDownDescription
data.value: Scroll the display down one screen

data.name: ScrollDisplayDownLineDescription
data.value: Scroll the display down one line

data.name: ScrollDisplayToCursorDescription
data.value: Scroll the display to the cursor

data.name: ScrollDisplayTopDescription
data.value: Scroll the display to the top

data.name: ScrollDisplayUpDescription
data.value: Scroll the display up one screen

data.name: ScrollDisplayUpLineDescription
data.value: Scroll the display up one line

data.name: SelectShellNextWordDescription
data.value: Adjust the current selection to include the next word using ShellNextWord

data.name: ShellNextWordDescription
data.value: Move the cursor to the end of the current token

data.name: SelectBackwardsLineDescription
data.value: Adjust the current selection to include from the cursor to the end of the line

data.name: SelectLineDescription
data.value: Adjust the current selection to include from the cursor to the start of the line

data.name: SelectAllDescription
data.value: Select the entire line. Moves the cursor to the end of the line

data.name: CopyOrCancelLineDescription
data.value: Either copy selected text to the clipboard, or if no text is selected, cancel editing the line with CancelLine.

data.name: MenuCompleteDescription
data.value: Complete the input if there is a single completion, otherwise complete the input by selecting from a menu of possible completions.

data.name: OopsAnErrorMessage1
data.value: Oops, something went wrong. Please report this bug with the details below. Report on GitHub: https://github.com/lzybkr/PSReadLine/issues/new

data.name: NextLineDescription
data.value: Move the cursor to the next line if the input has multiple lines.

data.name: PreviousLineDescription
data.value: Move the cursor to the previous line if the input has multiple lines.

data.name: CommandNotFoundError
data.value: Command '{0}' cannot be found.

data.name: ValidateAndAcceptLineDescription
data.value: Accept the input or move to the next line if input is missing a closing token. If there are other parse errors, unresolved commands, or incorrect parameters, show the error and continue editing.

data.name: DeleteCharOrExitDescription
data.value: Delete the character under the cusor, or if the line is empty, exit the process.

data.name: CantTranslateKey
data.value: Unable to translate '{0}' to virtual key code: {1}.

data.name: ChordWIthTooManyKeys
data.value: Chord can have at most two keys.

data.name: InvalidModifier
data.value: Duplicate or invalid modifier token '{0}' for key '{1}'.

data.name: InvalidSequence
data.value: Invalid sequence '{0}'.

data.name: String1
data.value: Invalid modifier token '{0}'. The supported modifiers are 'alt', 'shift', 'control' or 'ctrl'.

data.name: UnrecognizedKey
data.value: Unrecognized key '{0}'. Please use a character literal or a well-known key name from the System.ConsoleKey enumeration.
